Macro.Name: PowerOn
Macro.MacroValue: (A:PARTIAL PANEL ELECTRICAL, bool) (A:PARTIAL PANEL AVIONICS, bool) or not

Macro.Name: OilPres1Caution
Macro.MacroValue: (A:ENG1 OIL PRESSURE, psi) 30 < (A:ENG1 OIL PRESSURE, psi) 10 > and

Macro.Name: OilPres2Caution
Macro.MacroValue: (A:ENG2 OIL PRESSURE, psi) 30 < (A:ENG2 OIL PRESSURE, psi) 10 > and

Macro.Name: OilPres1Warning
Macro.MacroValue: (A:ENG1 OIL PRESSURE, psi) 95 > (A:ENG1 OIL PRESSURE, psi) 10 < or

Macro.Name: OilPres2Warning
Macro.MacroValue: (A:ENG2 OIL PRESSURE, psi) 95 > (A:ENG2 OIL PRESSURE, psi) 10 < or

Macro.Name: FFlow1Warning
Macro.MacroValue: (A:ENG1 FUEL FLOW GPH, gallons per hour) 25 >

Macro.Name: FFlow2Warning
Macro.MacroValue: (A:ENG2 FUEL FLOW GPH, gallons per hour) 25 >

Macro.Name: FuelQty1Caution
Macro.MacroValue: (A:FUEL LEFT QUANTITY, gallons) 10 < (A:FUEL LEFT QUANTITY, gallons) 0.5 > and

Macro.Name: FuelQty2Caution
Macro.MacroValue: (A:FUEL RIGHT QUANTITY, gallons) 10 < (A:FUEL RIGHT QUANTITY, gallons) 0.5 > and

Expression.Script: (A:ENG1 FUEL FLOW GPH, gallons per hour)

Update.Script: (@g:mfd NavButton pressed) 0 > if{ (@g:mfd NavButton pressed) ++ s0 (>@g:mfd NavButton pressed) l0 6 > if{ 0 (>@g:mfd NavButton pressed) } }

Element.Visibility: (A:PARTIAL PANEL NAV:1, bool) ! (A:PARTIAL PANEL NAV:2, bool) ! or

Expression.Script: 0 (L:SelectedNav2, number) 1 == (A:PARTIAL PANEL NAV:1, bool) or (A:PARTIAL PANEL NAV:2, bool) ! and if{ 19 }

MouseClick.Script: 1 (>@g:mfd NavButton pressed, bool) (L:SelectedNav2, number) 0 == if{ (>K:NAV1_RADIO_SWAP) } els{ (>K:NAV2_RADIO_SWAP) }
(P:Absolute time, seconds) (>L:time hdg bug changed, seconds) (>K:HEADING_BUG_DEC)
(P:Absolute time, seconds) (>L:time hdg bug changed, seconds) (>K:HEADING_BUG_INC)
1 (>@g:pfd HDGKnob pressed, bool) (A:Plane heading degrees gyro, degrees) (>K:HEADING_BUG_SET) (P:Absolute time, seconds) (>L:time hdg bug changed, seconds)
